description: Conjecturally the number of even integers the sum of two primes in exactly n ways.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..5000
mathematica: f[n_] := Length[ Select[2n - Prime[ Range[ PrimePi[n]]], PrimeQ]]; a = Table[0, {75}]; Do[c = f[n]; If[c < 75, a[[c + 1]]++ ], {n, 5000}]; a (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, using Paul Abbott's coding in A002375, Apr 07 2005 *)
author: _Bill Gosper_
